participant_1.background:
My drum set is my most valued material possession because it is a reminder of my time in Japan and the adventures I had there.
I wish I knew where I belonged in the world, but my gummy worm collection is a comfort to me.
I'm not sure how my family would react if I told them I was gay, but I know that they love me and I hope that they would accept me for who I am.
I'm a klutz, but I'm still proud of my comic book collection.
I remember summers spent playing in the creek with my friends.

participant_2.background:
I grew up with my family and they are the best people I know.
I like to watch shows that are funny and lighthearted, because they help me relax and take my mind off of my worries.
i draw comics.
i am a student in social sciences.
my favorite color is green.

content.text: I'm doing well! How about you?
I'm doing good, thanks for asking!
What do you do for fun?
I like to play video games, read comics, and hang out with my friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to read comics too!
What are some of your favorite comics?
I like to read a lot of different kinds of comics, but I really love the Marvel and DC universes.
I've been meaning to get into comics more, but I haven't really known where to start.
If you're looking for a good place to start, I would recommend checking out some of the graphic novels that are out there.
That's a great idea, thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about comics.
Me too! I love talking about them with people who are really into them.
It's always nice to meet someone who shares the same interests.
I agree! It's so much fun to talk about something you're passionate about.
